text: Linda Melson Harrison (born July 26, 1945) is an American actress, director and producer. She is known for her roles as Nova in the science fiction movie classic Planet of the Apes (1968) and the first sequel, Beneath the Planet of the Apes. == References == Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:Actors from Maryland Category:Businesspeople from Maryland
title: Linda Harrison (actress)
